description.value:
This staff resembles a blackened and burned length of ashen wood. You can Interact to touch the tip of this staff to a torch, tinder, or a flammable substance to ignite a flame.

Activate Cast a Spell; Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Ignition]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Breathe Fire]
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Breathe Fire], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Floating Flame]
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Floating Flame], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fireball]
  • 4th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fire Shield], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fireball] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Fire]
  • 5th @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Fireball] @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Fire]

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed ranks of all listed spells.
